text: Lovro Jotić (born 12 November 1994) is a Croatian handball player who plays for RK Vardar 1961 and the Croatian national handball team.EHF profile He participated at the 2019 World Men's Handball Championship.2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster ==Honours== ;Zagreb *Premier League: 2016–17 *Croatian Cup: 2017 ==References== ==External links== *European Stats *League and Cup stats Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:RK Zagreb players Category:RK Zamet players Category:Croatian male handball players Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Denmark Category:Aalborg Håndbold players
title: Lovro Jotić
